name: The Game With The Unnecessary Long Title made by the creators of Boredom Simulator
name_original: The Game With The Unnecessary Long Title made by the creators of Boredom Simulator
description:
Try this incredible story of love,  struggle, power and folders.

One of the most acclaimed classic of the past century now in its latest and definitive HD* edition.

You need 7zip to open the game because the .zip files cannot take the awesomeness of the game's title.

*HD only available on dedicated hardware.
